biotools.summary: An R package to visualise RNA-seq read coverage across annotated exons. Introns of long transcripts can be rescaled to a fixed length for better visualisation of exonic coverage.

bioschemas.name: wiggleplotr
bioschemas.summary: An R package to visualise RNA-seq read coverage across annotated exons. Introns of long transcripts can be rescaled to a fixed length for better visualisation of exonic coverage.
